verses.roman:
brahmarṣīṇāṁ bhṛgur ahaṁ
rājarṣīṇām ahaṁ manuḥ
devarṣīṇāṁ nārado 'haṁ
havirdhāny asmi dhenuṣu

synonyms: brahma-ṛṣīṇām—among the saintly brāhmaṇas; bhṛguḥ—Bhṛgu Muni; aham—I am; rāja-ṛṣīṇām—among the saintly kings; aham—I am; manuḥ—Manu; deva-ṛṣīṇām—among the saintly demigods; nāradaḥ—Nārada Muni; aham—I am; havirdhānī—Kāmadhenu; asmi—I am; dhenuṣu—among cows.
translation: Among saintly brāhmaṇas I am Bhṛgu Muni, and I am Manu among saintly kings. I am Nārada Muni among saintly demigods, and I am Kāmadhenu among cows.
